A Markdown template for OpenWIS meeting minutes

Note: You should change the ‘title’ in the yaml above to the title of the meeting, eg: OpenWIS Technical Committee 2016 May

DDth (FULL MONTH NAME) 2016 - teleconference - meeting minutes

(horizontal rule)

  1. lh level 1 (strong em)
    1. lh level 2 (strong em)
      1. lh level 3 or lower (no-em)
        1. li 1
        2. li 2 (weak em)
        3. ACTION-TC-99:Action: XX - Note the opening and closing tags that markup this as an ACTION.
  2. lh level 1
    1. li 1
    2. RESOLUTION-TC-99:Resolution: Note the opening and closing tags that markup this as a RESOLUTION.
    3. lh level 2 (strong em)

      1. blockquote

      2. li 2
  3. unordered list
    • ul li 1
    • ul li 2
  4. Links: (to see what is going on here, look at the code block below)
    • inline ref to external link
    • ref to link defined somewhere else on this page
    • link to local static assets that are stored in the /assets/ folder that is in the folder structure of the site 
- [inline ref to external link](http://www.example.com)
- [ref to link defined somewhere else on this page][L1]
- [link to local static assets that are stored in the /assets/ folder that is in the folder structure of the site ][assets]

[L1]: http://www.example.com
[assets]: http://openwis.github.io/openwis-documentation/assets/filename

(horizontal rule)
